review:
i remembered the saying " whatever happens, happens for good".
Earlier i booked appointment with vandana hegde( hegde hospital) which didnt turn in to a positive outcome because some other doctor medicated as vandana was busy.
so i ws in totally angry mood , discussing the same with one of my friend ,he suggested me for prasuna rani . i was not sure that whether meeting this time with the doctor will make me satisfied or not.

As soon as i reached to the hospital, nurse took the file and asked me to wait for 30 minutes, as number if patient were around 5.
i feel very good that it seems doctor gives time to their patients which is very good for patient.
she was continuously visiting ultrasound room also which is adjacent to the doctors room to attend the ultrasound patient.
when my number came, me and my wif entered in to the chamber , she was welcoming us by a wide smile. she made us very comfortable by listening us the whole thing and gave very good suggestions.
*** ** **** * *** *** ***

FIrst thing I should mention is that I got to know about Dr. Prasuna through Practo. 
I wholeheartedly thank Practo for this. 

And about Dr. Prasuna , she is very kind, very sympathetic , knowledgeable, hears about the problem calmly and provides better treatment options. I came out of the Himagiri hospital feeling that my medical needs were heard fully and I thank Dr Prasuna for doing great job to get my problem solved.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I have visited the doctor for the birth of my first child, I am extremely happy as she had taken my case nicely. All the regular check ups and medicine. My child was born on 2018 and he was healthy.
She explained everything clearly, along with the process and estimated cost. She is very kind by nature and provides solution and alternative to your problem.

Honestly I was not that much impressed after talking to her. She was constantly talking to the nurse while my wife was telling her about the issue. So, I found her very much inattentive. Also the hospital is not that much professional in terms of service. Even after doctor suggested for blood test, no nurse came there for doing test and we left after 10 minutes waiting.

I am really glad to meet her.
She is very friendly with us, and I was happy with her explanation of health issue. I like her patience and she  will not be irritated when we ask questions.
At last her treatment is simply superb.
********* ******..Nice Explanation..Really satisfied for Doctors treatment.. Doctor spend more time for Patient Clarify all Doubts.. ******* **** ******

review: The doctor was extremely professional and listened to the problem very patiently. I was satisfied with the way she took her time out to explain the root of the problem in detail and was very friendly. Also, she refrains from unnecessary test and medicines, and prescribes what's optimal.
Doctor is not available even after the prior appointment. Now my half day time waste for office leave. Please do be clear next time.
She is good, patience,polite, she listened to me , she went through my medical record.  I went there as she was a experience lady. And it is justified.
Very Understanding , ****** ***** ********* * hears the whole prob,em and deal wid it patiently .It was quite god to meet her

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,
review: I would recommend her as she was listening to my issue properly and was paraphrasing as well. She  explained me properly about the issue.Would be going again to visit her for any issues.
It was a nice experience. The doctor is so polite, humble and friendly. I recommend others to visit her.

The doctor was really understanding and making it very easy for us. Rather they are very less doctors who would really do this things.

I would really appreciate DR Prasuna. Very talented and understanding the problem and making it very easy with the solution.

I would like to recommend visiting this doc and get your problems and queries solved.

I had a good experience even thought this is my first time. i would really say yes.
Nice ambience, welcoming staff's, no bustle, Dr.  was nice, she give proper time to all, explained thing's well, listen problems properly. Overall I feel a positive aura.
Referred by a friend, I was consulting during my wife pregnancy. She is very nice and friendly. She provides proper guidelines.
